title: Luminary Tour: Bisa Butler—Portraits
hero_caption: Bisa Butler. Anaya with Oranges, 2017. Dimmitt Davies Collection. Photo by Margaret Fox. © Bisa Butler.
short_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided tour of Bisa Butler: Portraits.
list_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided tour of Bisa Butler: Portraits.
description:
Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of Bisa Butler: Portraits. Don't miss this chance to experience Butler's vibrant portrait quilts that capture personal and historical narratives of Black life.

This tour, offered only to Luminary members, takes place before the museum opens to the public and requires advance registration. The tour is limited to eight participants and lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed. These include but are not limited to wearing a face covering and not attending if you are experiencing any COVID-19 symptoms.

Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable.

Find further information on What to Expect on our website.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to eight participants.
